name: ShieldActionResponse
desc: Constants your extension that handles shield actions can use to tell the system how to respond to an action.

items.name: case close
items.desc: An instruction for the system to close the current application or web browser.

items.name: case `defer`
items.desc: An instruction to defer a response to the action.

items.name: case none
items.desc: An instruction that the system doesn’t need to take any additional action on behalf of the extension.

items.name: static func != (Self, Self) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two values aren’t equal.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of this value by feeding them into the given hasher.

items.name: init?(rawValue: Int)
items.desc: Creates a new instance with the specified raw value.

items.name: var rawValue: Int
items.desc: The corresponding value of the raw type.

items.name: typealias RawValue
items.desc: The raw type that can be used to represent all values of the conforming type.
